detail_desc: Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Imitation leather biker jacket with quilted details on the shoulders, a diagonal zip, press-studs on the lapels and a zip at the cuffs. Side pockets, a small, zipped front pocket and a small flap pocket with a press-stud. Lined.

Trousers geared to outdoor activity with good air permeability to wick away moisture. The trousers are made from a stretchy woven fabric for increased mobility, with a water-repellent finish on the bum and knees. Elasticated waist for added comfort, a zip fly and button, side pockets and a diagonal, zipped leg pocket for safe storage of valuables. Reinforced, wear-resistant hems with adjustable fasteners. Unlined.
Straight-style, long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit merino wool blend. Ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Large hoop earrings in twisted, textured metal.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood with an embroidered motif on the sides. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in an airy weave with a transparent section and decorative flounce at one side, a concealed zip at the back and cap sleeves.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
T-shirt in soft jersey.

Set with a T-shirt and matching shorts. T-shirt in patterned slub cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline and sleeves, a chest pocket with a button, and a rounded hem. Shorts in lightweight slub sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Three-strand necklace made of thin metal chains in various designs with pendants in metal and plastic. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button.
Jacket in soft silk with a tie at the waist, notch lapels, a wrapover front and narrow ties on the inside.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and buttons at the top.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in soft, velvet with a print motif on the front and short sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring, kangaroo pocket at the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves.
Cotton jersey top with short double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the back, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.

Halterneck balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable strap at the back of the neck and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, supple leather with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs with seams above the knees.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
V-neck top in patterned viscose jersey with 3/4-length sleeves that have a seam, pleats and a flounce.
Slightly longer hooded jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Wide trousers in a patterned weave with elastication at the back of the waist, zip fly and concealed hook and eye fastener. Side pockets and two welt back pockets.

Oversized top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, long, cuffed sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and high slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, short butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Side pockets, a decorative tie at the side and straight legs.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top and a tie belt. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Make-up bag in transparent plastic with a print motif. Zip with a tab at the top. Size 15x21 cm.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. Designed for indoor use only.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a viscose with a pompom trim at the top, gathered yoke at the back and long balloon sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Metal chain belt with several strands at the front, a decorative pendant at one end and a fastening with a carabiner hook at the other. Length approx. 114cm.
Sandals in lace and imitation suede with an adjustable ankle strap and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Dress in glossy jersey with long sleeves and a motif on the front with glittery details. Seam at the waist and a satin-lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.
Brazilian briefs in cotton with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and embroidery and appliqués on the knees.
Dress in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets.

Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Elasticated waist, and a skirt with gathered seams. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
Wide waist belt in braided imitation leather with a round metal buckle. Width 5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short skirt in sturdy cotton twill. High paper bag waist with wide, covered elastication, a zip fly and two buttons, and large flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, one with a button, and straight legs with creases front and back.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and lightly padded tongue and top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wallet chain in metal ball chain with a carabiner hook and keyring at one end and a carabiner hook at the other. Length 54 cm.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6S/7/8.
Bandeau bras in lace with lined, padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.

Dungarees in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the back and adjustable shoulder straps with press-stud fastenings. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.

Shirt in pattern-weave cotton twill with a collar, press-studs down the front, a yoke at the back, and long sleeves with elbow patches and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a gently rounded hem.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Fleece-lined nylon gloves with reinforced palms and elastication around the wrists and at the top. The gloves can be fastened together by a ring and hook.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and ties at the front of the hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with a round neckline, button placket and short slits in the sides.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in woven fabric with pile sections, earflaps, and a tab with a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Fleece lining.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Deep V-neck, ties at the neckline, long wide raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top.
Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.
